RootTable.Filter: SELECT a.ea_guid AS CLASSGUID, 'Attribute' AS CLASSTYPE, p.name AS package_name, o.name AS classifier_name, a.name AS attribute_name, a.type AS type_name, a.classifier AS type_id FROM ((t_attribute a INNER JOIN t_object o ON o.object_id = a.object_id) INNER JOIN t_package p ON p.package_id = o.package_id) WHERE o.package_id IN (#Branch#) AND o.object_type IN ('Class', 'DataType', 'Interface') AND (a.classifier IS NULL OR a.classifier = 0) AND a.type IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.name, o.name; #DB=COMMENT# Find the attributes that have a type specified that is not linked to an element (classifier) in the model. #DB=COMMENT#
